content: Is it possible to set PID from web UI? If yes, how can I do it?
How can I define the DOI link like this "(https://doi.org/10.14711/dataset/BOA4GQ)" rather than using the Fake DOI

I'm confused. Are you talking about switching from the FAKE DOI provider to a real one?

This can't be done through the UI. It's done through configuration. And how to configure changed recently so if you're trying to reconfigure, please use the version of the guides for your version of Dataverse.
thanks, is there any example of the domain.xml for configuring datacite as the PID provider?
That's a great question. I don't believe there is! Please feel free to create an issue for this.
@shan I just posted a config that works for me: https://dataverse.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/446770-docs/topic/domain.2Exml.20example.20for.20configuring.20DataCite.20PID.20provider/near/454946152
